name: Horsaloon
description:
You open the game as a horse in the wild west to find yourself in a saloon where you work! As a bartender! You notice an advertisement showing a new bowtie for only $100! You start behind the bar to start your work and earn your cash for that new bowtie. Make sure the drinks are made in order and in a timely manner! You have 400 seconds before your shift is over to earn your goal!

  • Left Click + Hold: Pick up Drink (will drop the drink after you stop holding)
  • WASD: Move around

The objective is to drop the drink in the numbered mug In the order said in the top right of the screen

CREDITS:
